mapper.select: select userNum , userId , userName, userStatus from user where userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw}
select userNum, userId, userPw, userName, userAddress, userHp from user where userNum = #{userNum}

select u.userNum, lp.likedProductNum, p.productName, pd.productNum, pd.productPrice, pi.imageSavedName from user u, likedProduct lp, product p, productDetail pd, productImage pi where u.userNum = lp.userNum and lp.productDetailNum = pd.productDetailNum and p.productNum = pd.productNum and pd.productDetailNum = pi.productDetailNum and u.userNum =#{userNum}

select u.userNum, p.productName, pd.productNum, pd.productPrice, pi.imageSavedName, h.productCount, r.totalPrice from user u, product p, productDetail pd, productImage pi, history h, receipt r where u.userNum = r.userNum and p.productNum = pd.productNum and pd.productDetailNum = pi.productDetailNum and h.productDetailNum = pd.productDetailNum and r.receiptNum = h.receiptNum and u.userNum =#{userNum}

select u.userNum, u.userName, u.userId, r.receiptNum, r.purchasedDate, r.totalPrice, h.productDetailNum, h.productCount, pd.productNum, pd.productPrice, p.productName, c.colorName, pi.imageSavedName from user u, receipt r, history h, productDetail pd, product p, color c, productImage pi where u.userNum = r.userNum and r.receiptNum = h.receiptNum and h.productDetailNum = pd.productDetailNum and pd.productNum = p.productNum and p.productNum = c.productNum and pd.productDetailNum = pi.productDetailNum and u.userNum =#{userNum}
